author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Kalki Sadasivam Memorial Trust Award was presented to Vijay Television for a print advertisement, at an event organised at the Barathi Vidya Bhavan here on Saturday.

Violinist Shriram Kumar presented the citation and cash award of Rs. 25,000 to representatives of the company for the print advertisement which had encouraged the use of helmets and safe driving practices.

Speaking at the event, Mr. Kumar recounted his association with vocalist M.S. Subbulakshmi and equated her musical journey with what was needed in the field of advertising to effectively take the message across to the audience. Cash awards worth Rs. 7,500 each were also given away by the trust to underprivileged college students.

The event was followed by a dance performance — Malai Pozhudhinile — by Priyadarshini Govind, which was directed and conceived by Gowri Ramnarayanan.
title: Vijay TV gets Kalki award
